generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, curving to the left, and vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to a bus stop and a building with stairs.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and along the sides of the road, including residential structures and a bus stop building.
- wall: A stone wall is visible on the right side of the image, forming part of the bus stop structure.
- fence: A metal fence is visible along the staircase on the right side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one supporting a traffic sign and another supporting a bus stop shelter.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating "130m" is visible on the right side of the image, and another sign with a "P" (parking) symbol is visible near the center.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and near the buildings.
- terrain: A small patch of grass or soil is visible near the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- person: A person is visible sitting on a bench at the bus stop on the right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a black Mini Cooper and a white van.
- truck: A large orange truck with the brand "SCHARR" is visible on the left side of the image.
